Basic.name: Mind Control
Basic.text: Take control of an enemy minion.
Basic.flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

Classic.name: Deathwing
Classic.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
Classic.flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

Classic.name: Pyroblast
Classic.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

Classic.name: Sea Giant
Classic.text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.

The Grand Tournament.name: Frost Giant
The Grand Tournament.text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

The Grand Tournament.name: Varian Wrynn
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

The League of Explorers.name: Anyfin Can Happen
The League of Explorers.text: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Archaedas
The League of Explorers.text: At the end of your turn, turn a random enemy minion into a 0/2 Statue.

The League of Explorers.name: Giantfin
The League of Explorers.text: At the end of your turn, draw 2 cards.

The League of Explorers.name: Lady Naz'jar
The League of Explorers.text: At the end of your turn, replace all other minions with new ones of the same Cost.

The League of Explorers.name: Lord Slitherspear
The League of Explorers.text: At the end of your turn, summon 1/1 Hungry Naga for each enemy minion.

The League of Explorers.name: Mirror of Doom
The League of Explorers.text: Fill your board with 3/3 Mummy Zombies.

The League of Explorers.name: Skelesaurus Hex
The League of Explorers.text: At the end of your turn, put a random card in your hand. It costs (0).

The League of Explorers.name: The Steel Sentinel
The League of Explorers.text: This minion can only take 1 damage at a time.

The League of Explorers.name: Timepiece of Horror
The League of Explorers.text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among all enemies.

The League of Explorers.name: Zinaar
The League of Explorers.text: At the end of your turn, gain a wish.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: C'Thun
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: C'Thun
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.
Whispers of the Old Gods.howToGet: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
Whispers of the Old Gods.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: DOOM!
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Faceless Behemoth
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

Tavern Brawl.name: Gearmaster Mechazod
Tavern Brawl.text: Boss Mechazod wins if he defeats either of you!

Tavern Brawl.name: Gearmaster Mechazod
Tavern Brawl.text: Boss At the beginning of each turn, Mechazod strikes!

Tavern Brawl.name: Nefarian
Tavern Brawl.text: Can't be targeted by spells. Boss: Nefarian wins if he defeats either of you!

Tavern Brawl.name: Overloaded Mechazod
Tavern Brawl.text: Boss At the beginning of each turn, Mechazod strikes!

Credits.name: Brian Schwab
Credits.text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion +1 Attack.
